Zero’s “Vehicle Control System” Is The Electric Clutch We’ve Been Waiting For
Zero has filed a patent for a “Vehicle Control System” that mimics the operation of a clutch in an internal-combustion motorcycle.
www.rideapart.com

Title: Zero is bringing an E-clutch to the market.
